thread.title_full: Scientists to test Earth-saving theory by crashing probe into asteroid - Bridgwater Mercury - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Bridgwater Mercury
title: Scientists to test Earth-saving theory by crashing probe into asteroid - Bridgwater Mercury
text:
Scientists are to attempt to nudge an asteroid out of its orbital path in a practice run for saving the world. The joint US-European Aida mission will crash a probe into the smaller of a pair of binary asteroids to see if the object's path can be altered.
 Bridgwater Mercury.
